attributes.title: Bad App
attributes.review: I would give it no stars if i could. It’s absolutely horrible. I can’t even explain how bad this app is, DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT. Buggy but not only that it glitches out constantly, and it’s named after trump so

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve downloaded. It literally kept glitching and log me out. I have all my bank app on my phone and they got hacked!!! Therefore don’t get this app it’s a 0/10!!!

attributes.title: Lots of bugs
attributes.review: This app has way too many bugs and problems. Someone should do something about this. I feel it sends my info to China.

attributes.title: Best thing ever🙈🙈😄😄😄🙂
attributes.review: It was great, just like America should be kept

attributes.title: Scary
attributes.review: This app was terrible.  Shortly after dowloading I realized it had changed all of my bios on all social media platforms to "Trump 2020" and also changed me profile picture to a picture of trump.

attributes.title: Can and Will cause your phone to crash.
attributes.review: I opened this app a couple of times, and for some reason it caused my phone to completely crash.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app has made me gag every time I look at it, this shows me a ✨disgusting✨ orange peel. I think he is a Cheeto idk either one. He is a disgrace to humans.🧚🏼✨💕Trump 2020💕✨🧚🏼 but on a gravestone✨this app also made my sister puke multiple times.

attributes.title: Do not get this app
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app my phone started glitching out, it was really frustrating and worrying like it gave my phone a virus or something!!

attributes.title: Settle for Biden
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and the only thing it showed me was an oompa-loompa with straw hair. And then it spit on me. So then I tried to delete the app and ICE comes barging through my front door, beats me up and leaves. I do not recommend this app.

attributes.title: Do not get this app
attributes.review: This app took 11 months to download and after that i got hacked and lost all my storage and my data and they made me lose control of my apps
